## The data provided here consists of 2 data sets:
A) xyfinal
This dataset contains both train and test data:
- 10299 measurements of 79 variables(measurements)
- the classification of the corresponding activity (variables Label and activity)
- the indication it this is training or test data (variable TrainTest)
B) avgxyfinal
This dataset provides the means of the 79 variables grouped by the activity.


```{r Summary of xyfinal and avgxyfinal}
names(xyfinal)
avgxyfinal
```

The data has been collected by the original data by the script attached. For details see the commented script.
